remarks: The 'less than' binary relation on the set of extended reals. Definition 12-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 173.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)
statement: ltxr $p |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* ) -> ( A < B <-> ( ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) /\ A <RR B ) \/ ( A = -oo /\ B = +oo ) ) \/ ( ( A e. RR /\ B = +oo ) \/ ( A = -oo /\ B e. RR ) ) ) ) ) $.
